text: "Daytime Friends" is a 1977 song by country singer Kenny Rogers and is the title track to his third studio album Daytime Friends. It went to number 28 in the United States, number 39 in the United Kingdom, number 21 in Canada, number 69 in Australia, number 16 in New Zealand and topped the country single charts in the Untied States and Canada. == References == Category:1977 songs Category:Country songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs
title: Daytime Friends (song)
